string-array.name: about_us_list
string-array.item: XYZ Institute is a leading educational institution dedicated to providing high-quality education in various fields.
Established in 1990, we have been offering a wide range of courses from basic to advanced levels.
Our faculty consists of experienced professionals and academicians who are passionate about teaching.
